thread.title: United Flight Makes Emergency Return To London
thread.title_full: United Flight Makes Emergency Return To London | Airwise News

author: Reuters
title: United Flight Makes Emergency Return To London
text:
A United Airlines flight bound for Los Angeles was forced to return to London's Heathrow Airport on Friday after declaring a full emergency. "The flight returned due to a possible electrical issue with a seat onboard the aircraft," a United Airlines spokeswoman said. "It landed safely."
Ralph McLaughlin, one of the passengers on board, said there had been sparks seen in the cabin.
"Firefighters assuring us everything is OK despite sparks and smoke on @united 935," he tweeted.
(Reuters)
